title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.12 - Trash and garbage disposal restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.12 - Trash and garbage disposal restricted

State Regulations

No person shall place, discharge or deposit in any manner
offal, garbage or any refuse in or upon any air terminal highway, operational
area, fuel storage area, public vehicular parking area, public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger ramp and apron area, public cargo
ramp and apron area, or public aircraft and storage area, except at such places
and under such conditions as the airport operator may from time to time
prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1275.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
